at Coastal Isles Wine Bar
Whether you have a question about our wine selection, are looking for a venue to host your private party or special event, or want us to save you a seat for Coastal Isles Comedy Night or one of our many other events, we’re just a phone call or email away.

Events
Why go far from home?
Entertainment is closer than you think
There’s always something to entertain you at Coastal Isles Wine Bar! From Wine-O Bingo, trivia, comedy nights, wine yoga, game day football, and more, we offer a little something for everyone. Follow us on Facebook so you never miss an event!

Coastal Isles Wine Bar
About Us
Sit. Enjoy, Savor.
We invite you to be our guest
Coastal Isles Wine Bar is born out of a passion for family, friends, wine, and culinary delights. We believe every sip and every bite should be a moment to cherish. Our team works tirelessly to curate a collection of exceptional wines and beers to tantalize your taste buds. From the moment you step into our bar, you’ll be greeted with warm hospitality and an atmosphere of relaxation. Join us on this journey and let us create unforgettable memories together.
Follow us on Facebook
Meet the Owners
Kevin & Shauna Leahy
We are the owners of your favorite neighborhood wine bar, Coastal Isles Wine Bar, located in the Bal Harbor Plaza. We’re excited to offer you great times with good friends, wine, beer, trivia, bingo, and of course great food! We look forward to becoming your neighborhood “Cheers,” can’t wait to get to know you all by name!
We moved to Florida 3 years ago, but were both born and raised in Ohio. We met and spent many years in the Columbus area. We moved to Charlotte in 2016, and then to Florida in 2021.
We have a total of four beautiful children, two 26-year-old twins, Michael and Katie, and two 8-year-old twin girls, Reagan and Cayleigh. Last, but definitely not least, we have our handsome Great Dane, Murphy.
I [Kevin] spent most of my career in the field of IT Consulting. I enjoy coaching youth sports and community involvement. Shauna works in the oncology field as a radiation therapist. She enjoys dining out, socializing with friends and family, and relaxing with a good book.
We find Punta Gorda to be the perfect quaint little town with everything we need to raise our 8-year-old twin daughters. Our family enjoys the social atmosphere of Fishermans Village, the festivals and farmers markets, and a personal favorite — sampling all of the delightful food provided by Punta Gorda’s many local restaurants.
In our short time here in Punta Gorda Isles, we’ve been extended immense kindness. Our passion for wine, beers, and small plates compliment our personalities for fun, food, and building lasting relationships.
We’re ready to bring on the flatbreads, flowing wine, and fun! Join us!
